## üìã Document Descriptions

### CURRENT-STATE-SUMMARY.md
**What**: Complete overview of the current state
**Why**: Understand what's ready and what's not
**When**: Read first to get oriented
**Length**: 5 minutes

### WORKFLOWS-READY-TO-USE.md
**What**: How to use the workflows
**Why**: Learn how to run workflows and what they do
**When**: Read after understanding current state
**Length**: 5 minutes

### GIT-PUSH-CLARIFICATION.md
**What**: Explains how git push works in workflows
**Why**: Understand why git push is important and how it's configured
**When**: Read if you have questions about git push
**Length**: 5 minutes

### ERROR-EXPLANATION.md
**What**: Explains the 403 permission error and how it was fixed
**Why**: Understand what went wrong and how it was resolved
**When**: Read if you see permission errors
**Length**: 5 minutes

### JIRA-SYNC-QUICK-START.md
**What**: 5-minute quick start guide
**Why**: Get up and running quickly
**When**: Read if you want to start immediately
**Length**: 5 minutes

### ENABLE-WORKFLOWS-NOW.md
**What**: How to enable workflows
**Why**: Learn how to activate workflows in GitHub
**When**: Read if workflows aren't showing up
**Length**: 3 minutes

### WORKFLOW-TRIGGER-DIAGNOSTIC.md
**What**: Troubleshooting guide for workflow issues
**Why**: Diagnose and fix workflow problems
**When**: Read if workflows aren't working
**Length**: 10 minutes

### WORKFLOWS-FIXED.md
**What**: Details of what was fixed
**Why**: Understand the fixes that were applied
**When**: Read if you want to know what changed
**Length**: 5 minutes

## ‚úÖ Checklist

Before using workflows:

- [ ] Read [CURRENT-STATE-SUMMARY.md](./CURRENT-STATE-SUMMARY.md)
- [ ] Read [WORKFLOWS-READY-TO-USE.md](./WORKFLOWS-READY-TO-USE.md)
- [ ] Configure GitHub secrets (JIRA_BASE_URL, JIRA_USER_EMAIL, JIRA_API_TOKEN)
- [ ] Commit workflow changes to GitHub
- [ ] Wait 1-2 minutes for GitHub to process
- [ ] Go to GitHub Actions
- [ ] Run a workflow manually to test
- [ ] Verify changes are committed and pushed

## üéì Learning Resources

### Understanding GitHub Actions
- [GitHub Actions Documentation](https://docs.github.com/en/actions)
- [Workflow Syntax](https://docs.github.com/en/actions/using-workflows/workflow-syntax-for-github-actions)
- [Permissions](https://docs.github.com/en/actions/using-jobs/assigning-permissions-to-jobs)

### Understanding PowerShell
- [PowerShell Documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/)
- [PowerShell Scripting Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/scripting/overview)

### Understanding Jira API
- [Jira REST API Documentation](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/rest/v3/)
- [Jira API Authentication](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/platform/basic-auth-for-rest-apis/)

## üìû Support

If you have questions:

1. Check the relevant documentation above
2. Read [WORKFLOW-TRIGGER-DIAGNOSTIC.md](./WORKFLOW-TRIGGER-DIAGNOSTIC.md) for troubleshooting
3. Check GitHub Actions logs for error messages
4. Review the PowerShell scripts for implementation details
